name: swallow nine tails (thien-my)
description:
this is a visual demo for SWALLOW NINE TAILS, a game about the nature of dead things and the living and the still-dead languages of both for those who may be alive. but whom everyone else will see as dead or an animal.

CURRENTLY IN-PROGRESS, CHECK PERIODICALLY FOR UPDATES

*it works best on chrome, other browsers may not work
